description: Create a Custom GPT version of Lloyd that mimics the /start-feature workflow to create context, plans, and deliverables documents for project planning
goal: Create /lloyd Custom GPT that guides users through phased project planning - from scoping to context gathering to plan creation to deliverables - replicating the /start-feature workflow in a conversational GPT format
requirements: GPT configuration file (JSON) for version control
Structured Instructions block (ROLE, OBJECTIVES, INTERACTION STYLE, WHAT TO DO, WHAT TO AVOID)
Knowledge file specifications for project artifacts
Conversation starters that drop users into the planning workflow
Capability configuration (web search, canvas, code interpreter)
constraints: Must work within OpenAI Custom GPT capabilities
Output should be a few configuration docs
Knowledge files limited by GPT upload limits
